      • SchemaCardFace

        private SchemaCardFace(int difficulty,
                       java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        difficulty - the difficulty of the Schema, must be greater than 0
        name - a name for the SchemaCardFace (this will be shown to the user)

    • Method Detail

      • loadFromJson

        public static SchemaCardFace loadFromJson(org.json.JSONObject obj)
                                   throws org.json.JSONException,
                                          MalformedSchemaCardFaceException
        Load a SchemaCardFace as declared from JSON
        Parameters:
        obj - a JSONObject that contains the specifications
        Returns:
        a SchemaCardFaces as declared in the JSONObject
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if the JSON is malformed
        MalformedSchemaCardFaceException - if the restrictions dimension are not valid

      • setCellRestriction

        private void setCellRestriction(java.awt.Point point,
                                CellRestriction restriction)
        Set the restriction on a specific position
        Parameters:
        point - the position of the restriction, 0 based
        restriction - the restriction to apply
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the position is invalid, or the restriction or point is null

      • isDiceAllowed

        public boolean isDiceAllowed(java.awt.Point point,
                             DiceFace diceFace,
                             SchemaCardFace.Ignore ignore)
        Checks if a dice is alowed in a specific position
        Parameters:
        point - the position to check
        diceFace - the dice to check
        ignore - the restriction to ignore
        Returns:
        true if the dice can be placed in point, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the position is invalid, or the restriction or point is null

        Parameters:
        point - the point of the schema, 0 based
        Returns:
